title: Bronze chandelier at the Arab Museum (Islamic Museum in Cairo)
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Musée Arabe No. 4. Lustre à lase octagon en bronze fondu à jour; provenant de la .... .... en 756 de l'heg. (1351 J.C.). Translation of photographer's description: Arab Museum No. 4 Octagonal molten bronze chandelier octagon from the .... .... in 756 of heg. (J. C. 1351).
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Bronze chandelier at the Arab Museum (Islamic Museum in Cairo)
